data.revised_prompt: Visualize a skillfully shot, high-quality photograph of a Spiced Apple Cider Whiskey cocktail. The drink sits in a clear, heat-tempered glass mug, flaunting the blending of warm amber shades from the bourbon and apple cider, accentuated by gentle surrounding illumination throwing off a mellow golden radiance. A cinnamon stick and a duo of cloves leisurely float approaching the surface, delivering tantalizing scents. An apple slice graces the rim with a hint of red and green contrast. Delicate reflections play on a wooden tabletop, injecting a snug, autumnal ambiance. In the delicately blurred background hints of warm-hued fall foliage bestow on the cocktail a welcoming aesthetic. The cocktail's preparation includes 2 oz of bourbon whiskey, 5 oz of hot apple cider, 1 oz of ginger liqueur, a single cinnamon stick, a pair of cloves, and an apple slice. The image is devoid of text or watermarks, and the background is clear with a soft focus. The style should emulate the level of striking realism typically seen in a professional food photograph.
